1. I would like to see a view that 'rolls' the weekly view. Currently if it is say Wednesday, I would prefer to see the NEXT seven days, as opposed to seeing last Sunday, Monday & Tuesday.

2. The color for category is an excellent idea - however, all you see is a tiny vertical stripe (by the alarm icon) on the RHS. Why not color the whole time slot?

3.  I like the calandar on the left hand side. It would be nice if days that have events were highlighted in a bolder manner - perhaps using a color like red.

Thanks for this excellent product.

Hey Mike, thank you for your suggestions.

> 1. I would like to see a view that 'rolls' the weekly view. Currently if it is
> say Wednesday, I would prefer to see the NEXT seven days, as opposed to seeing
> last Sunday, Monday & Tuesday.
This is covered in bug 614908

> 
> 2. The color for category is an excellent idea - however, all you see is a tiny
> vertical stripe (by the alarm icon) on the RHS. Why not color the whole time
> slot?
We already use different colored event boxes for different calendar colors. If you only use local calendars, you could just create multiple calendars, one for each "category".


> 3.  I like the calandar on the left hand side. It would be nice if days that
> have events were highlighted in a bolder manner - perhaps using a color like
> red.
You mean the small month calendar? If days contain events that are not marked with "show time as free"  (which is default for allday events, and non-default for normal events), then they should already be marked bold blue. If you would like a different color, please use userChrome.css to modify the colors.

If you agree, I'd like to mark this as a duplicate of bug 614908 since the other enhancements are already working or cannot be fixed.
